c74object.name: mb.doublefm~
c74object.digest: Double FM is an FM synthesiser with a carrier that is modulated by two seperate FM modulators.

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Lists starting with a number trigger a new midi event

method.name: freqRatio1
method.digest: The ratio between the carrier frequncy and the first modulator

method.name: freqRatio2
method.digest: The ratio between the carrier frequncy and the second modulator

method.name: modIndex1
method.digest: The ratio first modulator frequency and the modulation depth

method.name: modIndex2
method.digest: The ratio second modulator frequency and the modulation depth

method.name: adsr
method.digest:
Sets the parameters of the internal live.adsr~ with a list of attack decay sustain release inital peak final attack-slope decay-slope release-slope.
You do not need to use all of the arguments for this message.
